sources.title: All Over Town
sources.description: Ole Olsen and Chic Johnson star as vaudevillians who attempt to stage a cursed show.

sources.title: All Over Town (1937) OLSEN & JOHNSON
sources.description:
Stars: Ole Olsen, Chic Johnson, Mary Howard
 Director: James W. Horne

 Two zanies try to stage a show in a theater that has a reputation for being being jinxed.

sources.title: All Over Town (1937) Comedy
sources.description:
Two zanies try to stage a show in a theater that has a reputation for being being jinxed.
 
Director: James W. Horne
